channel.title: Kinnera on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Kinnera on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: stomp
item.description: last night I went to see stomp with kinnera. It was quite fun. I hadn’t really had any notion as to what it would be about.. but I really enjoyed it. It was quite something..tonight I am going to see common with miriam - it should be good time. I am excited.

item.title: all day
item.description: I slept all day today, it was fun. Last night i hung out with some friends chillin… and then with kinnera.. fun fun.. Today i plan to go dancing or something.. we shall see.. i am now having a great conversation.. with a good friend..
